title: Mom and Daddy, This Past Weekend, Church Complaints, Denzel Washington, Tiffany Haddish, Kevin Hart, Pray For Toronto, Hot Checks At The Church, Are You Smarter Than Tommy, Karen VS Tommy, Carla's Reality Update, Weekend Confessions and so much more.
itunes:title: Mom and Daddy, This Past Weekend, Church Complaints, Denzel Washington, Tiffany Haddish, Kevin Hart, Pray For Toronto, Hot Checks At The Church, Are You Smarter Than Tommy, Karen VS Tommy, Carla's Reality Update, Weekend Confessions and so much more.
description:
Today's show is dedicated to those that say, "Mom and Daddy." There is a difference. The crew talks about what they did over the weekend. Rev. Adnoid and Deacon Def Jam do Church Complaints and talk about the meeting for men that have way too much Gucci. Denzel got a sequel. Tiffany Haddish talks about Kevin Hart. We must Pray For Toronto. Are You Smarter Than Tommy? Karen VS Tommy. Weekend Confessions is back and we see how sugar can be used and we hear what Sugar did. Carla's Reality Update is here and she talks about what happened on Power. Before the close of the show, we find out that J. Anthony Brown hates company and he has a funny story involving The CEO and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
